title: RHUGT Christmas in September + RHOA!
itunes:title: RHUGT Christmas in September + RHOA!
description:
Danny recaps the Christmas in September episode of Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip, which featured a Denise revelation, apology tour, and prayer. Then Danny talks Real Housewives of Atlanta, which saw the women on their first cast trip of the season.


RHOA Recap: 17:00ish


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic




Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
